tasks.label: Run MINI SET (love)
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Set-Location -Path '${workspaceFolder}\MINI SET'; if (Get-Command love -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { love . } else { Write-Error 'love not found on PATH'; exit 1 }"

tasks.label: Run MINI SET (lovec explicit)
tasks.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Set-Location -Path '${workspaceFolder}\MINI SET'; if (Get-Command lovec -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { lovec . } else { Write-Error 'lovec not found on PATH'; exit 1 }"
